title: Nature Domain
content:
us to Ability Checks

10 turnsMelee Concentration

Take only half of the damage from Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing attacks

Infuse an object with an aura of light.

Only affects one target at a time.

Project a puff of noxious gas.

A flickering flame appears in your hand. It sheds bright light in a 9m radius and deals 1d8Fire damage when thrown. Throwing the flame immediately after you conjure it does not cost an action. Extinguishing or throwing it on subsequent turns costs an action.
